text: A pious Church and Cardinal Dolan trashes a dead trans woman who, like Jesus, helped the marginalized Cecilia Gentil helped trans people, sex workers and HIV/AIDS victims, while a certain Catholic cardinal lives extravagantly A human being died. This … [Louise Sharman](/@lks2017) flipped this story into [Twitchin Our World. UTTM News/Nuts/Repulsives n Corrupts.](/@lks2017/twitchin-our-world-uttm-news-nuts-repulsives-n-corrupts-svljmjggz)•15h More stories from [Cecilia Gentili](/topic/ceciliagentili) More stories from [Christianity](/topic/christianity) [This is the simplest prayer to the Holy Spirit](/topic/christianity/this-is-the-simplest-prayer-to-the-holy-spirit/a-qKixs9wWSraPmInkgmGJGQ%3Aa%3A48046604-84d5c9b1db%2Faleteia.org) Invoke the aid of the Holy Spirit with the simplest and most direct prayer that the Church offers. Yvette Cooper has hit back at Suella Braverman after she … [The most political thing we can do as Catholics](/topic/religion/the-most-political-thing-we-can-do-as-catholics/a-kSDuH74qQrW_nJeBGNd-1g%3Aa%3A3117863815-21f8eca78a%2Fncronline.org) I sometimes joke that, 30 years ago, I bet my life and my career on higher education, the Roman Catholic Church, and the American form of … [Aftermath of the violent bombing in the city of Rafah, Palestine](/topic/religion/aftermath-of-the-violent-bombing-in-the-city-of-rafah-palestine/a-OJRYQRhqQY2pEPbDWSAOFQ%3Aa%3A3483338757-f3198e2691%2Fflipboard.com) This footage was filmed and produced 22 February 2024. Palestinians inspect the site after Israeli bombs on Rafah flattened a mosque and destroyed homes, amid the ongoing conflict between Israel and the Palestinian Islamist group Hamas. SOUNDBITE, Tayseer Abu Hamid: 01:55-02:05 What happened last night was that someone called our neighbor by telephone, he said, "You have 20 minutes to leave the area because we will attack it." 02:06-02:15 After 20 minutes the explosion happened and it was so huge. 02:16-02:44 After the house was attacked, the same call came and and he was asked if he was okay or not. Then he said I would bomb the mosque, tell the people here to leave the area 200 meters away. It was just like an earthquake. And I was so shocked.
